mapper.insert: insert into checkout (rent_id, start, state, message) values (#{rentId}, current_timestamp, 0, #{message})
mapper.select: select a.checkout_id, a.rent_id, a.user_id, a.start, a.end, a.remark, a.state, a.message from checkout as a, rent as b where a.rent_id = b.rent_id and b.user_id = #{userId} and a.state!=3 ORDER BY start DESC LIMIT 1
